front.title: XPP Extensions for Implementing a Passive P2PSIP Overlay Network based on the CAN Distributed Hash Table

abstract.t: This document defines a set of extensions for the Extensible PeerProtocol (XPP) required for creating a P2PSIP overlay network basedon the CAN distributed hash table algorithm. It specifies how peersand clients must behave in order to maintain the overlay and use itfor the establishment of multimedia communication sessions.To limit the overhead due to maintenance operations and to allow theadoption of security policies for preventing malicious nodes todamage the overlay, joins are always initiated and controlled byexisting peers (hence the passive in PCAN).
